productData.shortDescription: Keep this Beverage Warmer on hand so you heat up a variety of beverages and soups at a moment's notice. With a convenient cord length and an easy-to-clean surface, this is a cool way to keep things hot.
productData.longDescription:
• The Beverage Warmer keeps your beverages and soups warm all day long
  • Ideal for coffee, tea, and soup
  • Cup not included
  • 110 - 120 volts
  • 16 watts
  • Plastic construction
  • Easy to clean
  • Measures 5-1/2" L x 4-4/5" W x 4/5" H
  • Cord measures 37-1/2" L
  • Imported
